name: Fofork
tagline: RSS news reader in PHP, forked from Steven Minutillo's "Feed on Feeds"
body:
This is fofork, a GPL RSS aggregator forked from "Feed on Feeds" by Steven
Minutillo (steve@minutillo.com - http://minutillo.com/steve/).

![screenshot](https://raw.github.com/robisacommonusername/fofork/gh-pages/images/1.5.screenshot.png)


Minimum Requirements for Installing fofork: 
* PHP >= 5.3, with xml, pcre, mysql, curl, zlib, mbstring and iconv extensions
* mysql/mariadb 5 or postgresql >= 8
* curl >= 7.10.5

Installation instructions:
* Extract contents of archive to web host root directory
* Create a direcytory 'cache', and ensure it is writeable by the web server
* Copy the file fof-config-sample.php to fof-config.php
* Edit the contents of fof-config.php to reflect your database name, login, etc
* Run install.php

Upgrade instructions:
To upgrade from a fofork 1.0.x or 1.1.x installation, please read the
'UPGRADE' file
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
